text:
November 12, 19$h
Nr. Many G. Crosby, President
and Research Director
Crosby Labs, Incorporated
Bax 233, Robbins Lane
Hicksville, L.I., New York
v
Dear Mr. Crosby:
I was recently discussing the development of FM multiplexing
with Mr. Coalton of the RCA Engineering Products Division, who told
me you had done much of the development work. He also said that you
had published an article in the July-August 19^3 issue of Communi¬
cation Engineering, covering this development! however the University
of Illinois does not have this publication on file in its library.
If there are reprints of this article available, I would appre¬
ciate knowing where I might obtain one. I am investigating the pos¬
sibility of the use of FM multiplexing in a network of educational
FM stations.
Any information you may be able to furnish will be appreciated.
Yours very truly,
CSBscp
Cecil S. Bidlack
Television Engineer
